name: Irresponsible Ninja
description:
Hyper Casual one button game.

Hold your finger on the screen to stretch out the stick and reach next platform.

Time is running so you'd better land your stick on the red spot to earn precious seconds.

How far will you go?

------------------------------------------------------

TECH SPECS

------------------------------------------------------

Framework: Phaser 3.16.2

Physics engine: none

Lines of code: 598

------------------------------------------------------

Available for licensing or with completely explained source code.
Learn to build your own game: www.emanueleferonato.com
